trans-unit.source: Provides the base functionality for creating data-related collections in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms"></xref> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a funcionalidade de base para a criação de dados relacionados com as coleções no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms"> </xref> espaço de nomes.

trans-unit.source: The BaseCollection class is not intended for use by application developers.
trans-unit.target: A classe de BaseCollection não destina-se para utilização pelos programadores de aplicações.

trans-unit.source: Application developers should use <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase> instead.
trans-unit.target: Os programadores de aplicações devem utilizar <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>em vez disso.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: The BaseCollection class implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: Implementa de classe BaseCollection o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>interface.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the BaseCollection class include: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>
trans-unit.target: As classes que derivam da classe de BaseCollection incluem:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection></xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the elements of the current one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> to the specified one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> starting at the specified destination <xref:System.Array> index.
trans-unit.target: Copia todos os elementos de atual unidimensional <xref:System.Array>para especificado unidimensional <xref:System.Array>que começa com o destino especificado <xref:System.Array>índice.</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from the current <xref uid="langword_csharp_Array" name="Array" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O unidimensional <xref:System.Array>que é o destino dos elementos copiados atual <xref uid="langword_csharp_Array" name="Array" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based relative index in `ar` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero relativo no `ar` em que copiar começa.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of elements in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número total de elementos na colecção.

trans-unit.source: The total number of elements in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O número total de elementos na colecção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that enables iterating through the members of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto que permite a repetir os membros da coleção.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>interface.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a coleção é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: The collections that derive from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection> class are always writable, which is why this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: As coleções que derivam de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>classe são sempre gravável, que é a razão pela qual esta propriedade devolve sempre `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>

trans-unit.source: This property is always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o acesso à <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>está sincronizada.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: If a collection is thread safe, the IsSynchronized property returns `true`, and the programmer does not have to do anything to keep the collection thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Se uma coleção é seguros para threads, a propriedade IsSynchronized devolve `true`, e o programador tem de fazer nada para manter o thread de recolha.

trans-unit.source: If, as is the case with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>, the IsSynchronized property returns `false`, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property returns an object that can be used with the C# `lock` keyword.
trans-unit.target: Se, como é o caso do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>, devolve de propriedade IsSynchronized `false`, em seguida, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection.SyncRoot%2A>propriedade devolve um objeto que pode ser utilizado com a c# `lock` palavra-chave.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection.SyncRoot%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>

trans-unit.source: Use the static <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Enter%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Exit%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Threading.Monitor> class to manually lock and unlock the synchronization object.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a estática <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Enter%2A>e <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Exit%2A>métodos para a <xref:System.Threading.Monitor>classe a manualmente de bloqueio e desbloqueio o objeto de sincronização.</xref:System.Threading.Monitor> </xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Exit%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Enter%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of elements contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de elementos contidos no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> containing the elements of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref> que contém os elementos da coleção.

trans-unit.source: This property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> unless overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> a menos que substituída numa classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar acesso para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If, as is the case with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection.IsSynchronized%2A> property returns `false`, then the SyncRoot property returns an object that can be used with the C# `lock` keyword.
trans-unit.target: Se, como é o caso do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection.IsSynchronized%2A>propriedade devolve `false`, em seguida, a propriedade SyncRoot devolve um objeto que pode ser utilizado com a c# `lock` palavra-chave.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection.IsSynchronized%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection"> </xref>.
